name: Get_Location
response_summary: The API response includes a list of country codes, specifically "MY" for Malaysia, "IN" for India, and "AU" for Australia. These codes represent the countries covered or referenced in the data.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for retrieving a list of supported country codes in the system. It provides standardized country identifiers (e.g., "MY" for Malaysia) that can be used across other APIs for location-based services. The response includes all available country codes without requiring any input parameters, making it ideal for initial system setup or location reference checks.

response_fields.description: A list of country codes representing the countries covered or referenced in the data.

ar_items.description: The ISO country code (e.g., 'MY' for Malaysia, 'IN' for India, 'AU' for Australia).
